verbs.description: investigators zero in on crude bombs as clues to motive [ARG0: investigators] [V: probing] [ARG1: crude pipe bombs sent to prominent critics of president donald trump] are trying to determine whether the devices were intended to detonate or simply to sow fear law enforcement officials told the associated press thursday the officials said the devices were not rigged like a booby - trapped package bomb that would explode upon opening they had timers and batteries but never went off law enforcement officials were still uncertain whether the devices were poorly designed or never intended to cause physical harm the officials spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss the ongoing investigation by name white house official clinton trump deepti hajela senate vice president twitter washington nancy pelosi united states ap secret service donald trump bill de blasio fbi laurie kellman president barack obama new castle james t hodgkinson george soros john brennan rep maxine waters the associated press debbie wasserman schultz clintons new york democratic national committee manila cnn barack obama rep debbie wasserman schultz gop chairman wisconsin sisak soros fund management bill clinton vermont director california representative president maxine waters michelle cia hillary rodham clinton delaware joe biden wilmington hillary clinton manhattan chuck schumer eric holder florida bernie sanders robert de niro tony awards sarah huckabee sanders

investigators zero in on crude bombs as clues to motive investigators probing [ARG1: crude pipe bombs] [V: sent] [ARG2: to prominent critics of president donald trump] are trying to determine whether the devices were intended to detonate or simply to sow fear law enforcement officials told the associated press thursday the officials said the devices were not rigged like a booby - trapped package bomb that would explode upon opening they had timers and batteries but never went off law enforcement officials were still uncertain whether the devices were poorly designed or never intended to cause physical harm the officials spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss the ongoing investigation by name white house official clinton trump deepti hajela senate vice president twitter washington nancy pelosi united states ap secret service donald trump bill de blasio fbi laurie kellman president barack obama new castle james t hodgkinson george soros john brennan rep maxine waters the associated press debbie wasserman schultz clintons new york democratic national committee manila cnn barack obama rep debbie wasserman schultz gop chairman wisconsin sisak soros fund management bill clinton vermont director california representative president maxine waters michelle cia hillary rodham clinton delaware joe biden wilmington hillary clinton manhattan chuck schumer eric holder florida bernie sanders robert de niro tony awards sarah huckabee sanders

investigators zero in on crude bombs as clues to motive investigators probing crude pipe bombs sent to prominent critics of president donald trump [V: are] trying to determine whether the devices were intended to detonate or simply to sow fear law enforcement officials told the associated press thursday the officials said the devices were not rigged like a booby - trapped package bomb that would explode upon opening they had timers and batteries but never went off law enforcement officials were still uncertain whether the devices were poorly designed or never intended to cause physical harm the officials spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss the ongoing investigation by name white house official clinton trump deepti hajela senate vice president twitter washington nancy pelosi united states ap secret service donald trump bill de blasio fbi laurie kellman president barack obama new castle james t hodgkinson george soros john brennan rep maxine waters the associated press debbie wasserman schultz clintons new york democratic national committee manila cnn barack obama rep debbie wasserman schultz gop chairman wisconsin sisak soros fund management bill clinton vermont director california representative president maxine waters michelle cia hillary rodham clinton delaware joe biden wilmington hillary clinton manhattan chuck schumer eric holder florida bernie sanders robert de niro tony awards sarah huckabee sanders

investigators zero in on crude bombs as clues to motive investigators probing crude pipe bombs sent to prominent critics of president donald trump are trying to determine whether the devices [V: were] intended to detonate or simply to sow fear law enforcement officials told the associated press thursday the officials said the devices were not rigged like a booby - trapped package bomb that would explode upon opening they had timers and batteries but never went off law enforcement officials were still uncertain whether the devices were poorly designed or never intended to cause physical harm the officials spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss the ongoing investigation by name white house official clinton trump deepti hajela senate vice president twitter washington nancy pelosi united states ap secret service donald trump bill de blasio fbi laurie kellman president barack obama new castle james t hodgkinson george soros john brennan rep maxine waters the associated press debbie wasserman schultz clintons new york democratic national committee manila cnn barack obama rep debbie wasserman schultz gop chairman wisconsin sisak soros fund management bill clinton vermont director california representative president maxine waters michelle cia hillary rodham clinton delaware joe biden wilmington hillary clinton manhattan chuck schumer eric holder florida bernie sanders robert de niro tony awards sarah huckabee sanders
